title: Fundementals of Web Development
description: HTML, CSS, responsive design, and basic frontend development.

title: Fundementals of JavaScript
description: Fundamentals including functions, control flow, event handling, DOM manipulation, closure, and asynchronous programming.

title: Web Developer
description: Developed cross-browser responsive websites, internal tools, banners, and emails.

title: Intro to Web Accessibility
description: WCAG guidelines, assistive technologies, accessibility best practices, and accessibility testing tools.

title: CS50: Intro to Computer Science
description: Explored algorithmic thinking, abstraction, data structures, and software engineering. Applied skills to real-world problem sets in biology, cryptography, and finance.

title: Senior Web Developer
description: Ownership of fullstack and frontend projects. Evaluate and assess modern technologies. Review project scopes, mentor developers, and conduct code reviews.

title: Software Developer
description: Led development of a React app helping to organize movers and moves. The app was started by UofT students, but needed volunteers to get things up and running again.

title: Senior Software Developer
description: Drive customer growth through experimentation. Led cross-functional projects, addressed tech debt, mentored peers, and managed on-call responsibilities.

title: Fullstack to Backend
description: Set up servers, create APIs, and deployed code to the world by learning the full stack, including databases, containers, and a bit of DevOps and AWS.

title: AWS Certified Developer Associate
description: Hands-on experience and knowledge of the services covered in the AWS Certified Developer Associate exam.
